title: Introducing 'Bachelor Happy Hour'
description:
The one and only “official” Bachelor podcast is coming! Hosts (and former Bachelorettes) Rachel Lindsay and Ali Fedotowsky-Manno aren’t strangers to dating on national TV, and now, they’re sharing their stories, interviewing Bachelor Nation cast members and so much more. “Bachelor Happy Hour with Rachel & Ali” premieres Wednesday, July 31st.

Listen ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. Available in the Wondery App https://wondery.app.link/bachelorhappyhour.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
